maxims.translation: as you greet, so you will be greeted
as i sow, shall i reap

maxims.maxim: ܘܐܡܪ ܝܫܘܥ ܠܩܢܛܪܘܢܐ ܗܘ ܙܠ ܐܝܟܢܐ ܕܗܝܡܢܬ ܢܗܘܐ ܠܟ ܘܐܬܐܣܝ ܛܠܝܗ ܒܗ ܒܫܥܬܐ
maxims.translation: And Eshu (Yeshua) said unto the Qentruna (the Centurion), Go, in such a way that you have believed, it will be unto you. And his boy was healed at that moment!
favorable winds, stay the course (get in the Flow and Go)
